thread.section_title: Hotel Forte - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: It's all about LOCATION
thread.title_full: It's all about LOCATION - Review of Hotel Forte, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: esampang
title: It's all about LOCATION
text: This hotel is in a great location. A stones throw away from the train station. The room itself was compact as well as the bathroom. It would be a tight squeeze for a couple with a medium sized luggage each. However, the room was warm as I stayed during winter. Breakfast was ok. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful with any questions we had.
